info.name: Australion SE
info.description: A new dawn in interface from Australis (with components FX like Chromium). For Firefox 20 or more, and requies FxChrome add-on.
info.additionalInfo:
This is a beta version from the original Australion (now style 83902).

Leave it easier for the web using the dynamic enriquecidamente interface simple. Editable, open-source, high refined for true identity of your Firefox browser. This is the second edition, to test publicly. We expect only a draft version, updates will come later.

With icons form GNOME and Australis interface. With source from style 87110
